mapper.select: select m.perms from role_info r left join account_role_info ar on(r.role_id = ar.role_id) left join account_info a on(a.account_id = ar.account_id) left join role_menu rm on(rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join menu_info m on(m.menu_id = rm.menu_id ) where a.login_name = #{username} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''

select m.* from menu_info m where m.type <> 1 and m.MENU_ID in (select distinct rm.menu_id from role_menu rm left join role_info r on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join account_role_info ur on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join account_info u on (u.account_id = ur.account_id) where u.login_name = #{username}) order by m.order_num
